results.title: Comparing the Best TypeScript Alternatives [Part I] - HackerNoon
results.snippet: TypeScript is a statically-typed language that was developed as a superset of JavaScript. CoffeeScript, on the other hand, is a dynamically-typed language that was designed to provide a more concise and expressive alternative to JavaScript.
